tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE maintenance_records (
    record_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    drone_id INT NOT NULL,
    maintenance_date DATE NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    technician_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    service_cost DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_records (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  drone_id INT NOT NULL,
  maintenance_date DATE NOT NULL,
  maintenance_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  maintenance_cost DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE drones (
  drone_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  drone_model VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  last_service_date DATE,
  total_flights INT NOT NULL,
  battery_level DECIMAL(5, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE DroneMaintenanceRecord (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  drone_id INT,
  maintenance_date DATE,
  description TEXT,
  technician_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE Drone (
  drone_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  drone_model VARCHAR(50),
  purchase_date DATE,
  last_serviced DATE,
  status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    drone_id INT,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(255),
    maintenance_date DATE,
    servicing_personnel VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE drone_details (
    drone_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    manufacturer VARCHAR(255),
    model VARCHAR(255),
    purchase_date DATE,
    warranty_expiry_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE service_history (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    record_id INT,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(255),
    servicing_date DATE,
    servicing_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE repair_records (
    repair_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    record_id INT,
    repair_type VARCHAR(255),
    repair_date DATE,
    repair_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE drones (
	drone_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	drone_name VARCHAR(50),
	drone_model VARCHAR(50),
	last_service_date DATE,
	service_due_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_records (
	record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	drone_id INT REFERENCES drones(drone_id),
	service_date DATE,
	maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
	maintenance_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE repair_history (
	history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	drone_id INT REFERENCES drones(drone_id),
	repair_date DATE,
	repair_type VARCHAR(50),
	repair_details TEXT
);
